dt: {bc}distress or suffering resulting from oppression or persecution

dt.t: the trials and {wi}tribulations{/wi} of starting a new business

et: Middle English {it}tribulacion{/it}, from Anglo-French, from Latin {it}tribulation-, tribulatio{/it}, from {it}tribulare{/it} to press, oppress, from {it}tribulum{/it} drag used in threshing, from {it}terere{/it} to rub {ma}{mat|throw:1|}{/ma}
shortdef: distress or suffering resulting from oppression or persecution; also : a trying experience
